about_the_game:
Please note that Boba Bar: Bubble Tea Tycoon is still in active development, and along with the Steam page, will see significant updates in the coming weeks and months.


Embark on a journey to become the most renowned bubble tea entrepreneur in town. Starting with just a humble boba stand in your neighborhood, you're set to take on the challenge of crafting the most sought-after Bubble Tea. As you discover new flavors and acquire advanced equipment, watch your income rise, and your stand evolve, expanding into bustling streets and lively city centers. Every day brings new challenges, with customers introducing unpredictable flavor cravings, forcing you to balance their desires with profitable decision-making.

Navigate vibrant landscapes and balance stock levels; your choices shape the narrative of your boba business. Master the art, strategize every move, and build a bubble tea empire from the ground up in this beautiful Japanese aesthetic inspired world, and did we mention, CATS!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8 or greater
  • Processor: 2.0GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Direct X 9.0c compliant video card with 512 MB of RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Boba Bar: Bubble Tea Tycoon is a Kawaii themed pixel art game where you start your journey with a humble drink stand. Learn new recipes and unlock new equipment and locations, manage sales prices and inventory in order to succeed in becoming the largest bubble tea tycoon in town!
supported_languages: English, German, Spanish - Spain, Indonesian, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Ukrainian, Vietnamese, French, Italian, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Norwegian, Polish, Romanian, Russian, Swedish, Turkish
